article.title: Libraries and Cultural Change
article.author: Benge, R.C.
article.text: This work is a contribution to the literature of librarianship and some parts of it may interest a wider audience. The chapters consist of a series of introductory explorations into several related fields. Some of these areas are usually included in curricula for library studies programmes, under a title such as "The library and the community" or "The social background to libraries."
